subject: p10933609
Findings: In comparison with the study of, the Dobbhoff tube now extends to the distal stomach. The tube takes an unusual course, raising the possibility of previous gastric surgery. When compared to the study of, the extensive bilateral opacification has substantially decreased. Some of the residual may merely reflect fibrotic healing.
